keywords.indexterm: annotation open query builder search property

refbody.section:
Annotation applying on dataset attributes dedicated to search criteria.
Name: Service
Namespace URI: http://www.odcgroup.com/mdf/QueryBuilder This annotation can have the following properties:
For sorting attributes in the drop down list of search criteria.
Property name: DisplayRank
Property value: Integer
To associate specific query to a calculated attribute.
Property name: OpenQuery
Property value: Code to be transformed into SQL at runtime. Sample: t0.code @operator @valueToUpper or t0.name @operator @valueToUpper or t0.ext_cusip_syn_c @operator @valueToUpper or t0.ext_isin_syn_c @operator @valueToUpper or t0.ext_reuters_syn_c @operator @valueToUpper or t0.ext_sedol_syn_c @operator @valueToUpper
